code: import React,{useState}from'react';import CountUp from"react-countup";import VisibilitySensor from"react-visibility-sensor";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const counterblock=[{icon:'flaticon-graphic',count:'3568',title:'Project Compalte'},{icon:'flaticon-plan',count:'7859',title:'Satisfied Clients'},{icon:'flaticon-target-1',count:'6352',title:'International Awards'},{icon:'flaticon-teamwork',count:'7856',title:'Expert Team Members'}];function Counter(props){const[focus,setFocus]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"fact-section grey-bg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fact-boxes row justify-content-between align-items-center",children:counterblock.map((item,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-3 col-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fact-box text-center mb-40",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:item.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CountUp,{start:focus?0:null,end:parseInt(item.count),duration:5,redraw:true,children:_ref=>{let{countUpRef}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"counter",ref:countUpRef}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(VisibilitySensor,{onChange:isVisible=>{if(isVisible){setFocus(true);}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"plus-icon",children:"+"})})]});}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"title",children:item.title})]})},i))})})});}export default Counter;
